name: mikroe.click.silentstep2
short_description: Silent Step 2 Click is a compact add-on board that allows extremely smooth and silent operation of the connected motor. This board features the TMC2130, a high-performance two-phase stepper motor driver from Analog Devices. The driver uses an external motor power supply of 4.75 up to 43V to power a 2-phase stepper motor up to 2A coil current (2.5A peak).
